name: Crazy Pen Tower Defense || Part 1
description:
Story:

Enemies are attacking Pen City! Defend Pen City with turrets and try to survive the attack

Instructions:

- Click/tap the gray bar to open the shop

- Hover over the towers for cost

- Click and drag turrets to track (make sure it is not touching the brown track or any other turrets!)

- Press the white and black play button to start a wave.

- Press the white arrows to speed up or slow down the round.

- Press D to add turret target lines

Scratch Version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/568164080/
